title: Cabinet
description: Cabinet, three tiered veneered wooden cabinet with double doors at each tier.  Four small drawers beneath projecting flat top.  Straight short legs terminate in square spiral carving (see card for small drawing), front and back legs being joined by straight stretchers resting flat on floor.  hinges, locks and drawer-pull flanges of brass in butterfly design.  Corners and divisions between tiers strengthened by brass bands in related designs.  Front intricately veined gold colored wood, banded with smooth red brown wood. Sides soft wood, stained black.
creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
